org.jboss.netty.channel.xnio
Interface XnioChannel

All Superinterfaces:
Channel, Comparable<Channel>
All Known Subinterfaces:
XnioServerChannel
public interface XnioChannel
extends Channel

A Channel which uses JBoss XNIO as its I/O provider.
